TextView.android:text: In my final JAVA class, some classmates and I had to recreate a program that our professor had written during his career. We had to create an application that would allow for creation of a patient and all data associated with that patient. This data would be stored in a SQL database.\n\nAll of the forms had to allow for data creation, editing, and deletion. In addition, a report had to be generated on demand for each patient containing all the pertinent records
